name: Crystal of Atlantis
description:
Years ago, a visitor from another world foresaw doom for a certain civilization on Earth. To save its people, he gave them a child to be raised among them, hoping his knowledge and insight would be enough to save them from their fate.

As time passes, everyone can see there is something special about the child named Tristan. He grows up into a strong young man and saves his people from a deadly flood. Soon he is on the path to becoming their leader, and he sees great things in their future. But as Tristan guides the newly-established kingdom of Atlantis, will he lead them to the prosperous future he imagines… or does darkness still wait for them in the end?

Game Features

-Explore the origins of the legendary kingdom of Atlantis in an exciting new story split into five chapters.
-Unlock twenty upgrades to build Atlantis up from a small tribe to an advanced civilization.
-Challenge yourself with numerous match-3 puzzles to earn the resources Atlantis needs in order to progress and thrive.
-Learn the secrets of Atlantis… and the dangers of ambition.
